short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slow Roads is an entertaining driving simulator in which you'll be able to maneuver a car along an endless highway

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Long car trips become annoying due to traffic and traffic jams, right? But they can be pretty really relaxing when it's a deserted highway full of beautiful scenery
